var createTrayRenderSystem=function createTrayRenderSystem(){var tray,trayShadow;var TRAY_WIDTH,TRAY_HEIGHT,TS_WIDTH,TS_HEIGHT;return{init:function init(_ref,_ref2){var trayState=_ref.trayState;var width=_ref2.width,assets=_ref2.assets;var atlas=assets.gameAssets;var trayAtlas=assets.foodInPot;// tray = atlas.findRegion("tray", -1);
tray=trayAtlas.findRegion("hot_pot",-1);trayShadow=atlas.findRegion("tray-shadow",-1);TRAY_WIDTH=width/3.8;TRAY_HEIGHT=TRAY_WIDTH*tray.height/tray.width;TS_WIDTH=TRAY_WIDTH*0.8;TS_HEIGHT=TS_WIDTH*trayShadow.height/trayShadow.width;},update:function update(delta,_ref3,_ref4){var trayState=_ref3.trayState;var batch=_ref4.batch,width=_ref4.width,height=_ref4.height,camera=_ref4.camera;batch.setProjection(camera.combined);batch.begin();batch.setColor(1,1,1,1);tray.draw(batch,trayState.x-TRAY_WIDTH/2,trayState.y,TRAY_WIDTH,TRAY_HEIGHT);trayShadow.draw(batch,trayState.x-TS_WIDTH/2,trayState.y+height/13,TS_WIDTH,TS_HEIGHT);batch.end();}};};export default createTrayRenderSystem;
